metadata.title: CVE-2019-17637 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In all versions of Eclipse Web Tools Platform through release 3.18 (2020-06), XML and DTD files referring to external entities could be exploited to send the contents of local files to a remote server when edited or validated, even when external entity resolution is disabled in the user preferences.

criterions.comment: eclipse-wtp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.18-2').
